attributes.action: Primary School Intake - Change to January & September
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children born just after the September 1st deadline have to wait until they are almost 5 before they start school which gives them a big disadvantage. My grandaughter will be almost 5 years old,her birthday is in September, before she can start school. Her brother who is nearly two years younger will start school one year after her as his birthday is late August. A change to 2 intakes  a year, January and September would benefit many children.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
